Author: davidw
Content:
Bzzzzzzt! Politics!

I think the most that can be said without much of anyone besides accountants disagreeing is that simplifying the tax code would actually do a lot of good.

Author: newt0311
Content: How about the Laffer curve? Historically, whenever the capital gains tax rate has been decreased, revenue has increased due to secondary effects. That sounds like a pretty good argument to me.

Author: bootload
Title: Is "Don't Be Obnoxious" the new "Don't Be Evil"?

Author: deepster
Content: I have no problems with double taxation. Just don't compare capital gains vs. Income tax. Which is what the blogger is doing.  When in reality the equation is: Actual Tax Paid = (Income Tax + Capital Gains tax).

Author: hs
Content:
when i took math courses, we used maple, and R (for statistics)

engineering courses i took focused on matlab, and C (for embedded microcontrollers)

I never use java as 'domain-specific-language' for those projects.

The intro to CS was java; however, i took C for engineering course for uni requirement (counted as intro to cs)

Author: deepster
Content:
1.) The money you've invested was already taxed.\n2.) The money you received as dividends was taxed through corporate income tax.

I have no qualms about paying captial gains tax. But the blogger's comparison of capital gains tax vs. income tax is incorrect.

Author: themichael
Title: Robbie Williams Goodbye To The Normals

Author: netcan
Content:
Your right. Some bits (like the last article) of Cubans economics might be interesting trains of though to follow. But this is pretty dumb.

It's either ignoring the very basic of economics (if you make vendors charge less for something then it costs them, they stop making it) or it failing to see that credit is just another thing you make & sell.

Author: hs
Content:
i looked up a sample code for single file upload, tweaking it to handle corner cases; however, there's a cgi library for that shrug ... better, simpler

but as a bonus, i now know http request better :D ... extending the cgi library, for example, uploading multiple files in one http request

library also has another use, for testing

for example, i got stuck char used as separator/ending in netstring, used in lighttpd's scgi

i looked at python scgi library source code, saw the output scgi variables etc, then readjust my porting code

but i strongly agree that building something from scratch is tremendously rewarding ... no matter how crappy it's - there's a beauty only u got the priviledge to enjoy ... FUN!

Title: Sticky tape is source of X-rays

Author: markessien
Content: If you want people to show up, you need to phrase it as a neutral event. If you invited people to an art gallery or a concert where they are not forced to sit accross from a stranger, more would show up.

Author: tertius
Content: Definitely too much to hope for,  Bill and Mary have friends who "need" to be better than Bill and Mary.  If Bill and Mary don't want more credit, their neighbours Mark and Kathy will get more credit.

Author: known
Title: ActiveQuant
Content: AQ is a framework or an API for automated trading, opportunity detection, financial engineering, research in finance, connecting to brokers, etc. - basically everything around trading, written in Java, using Spring. All is published under a usage friendly open source license.

Author: mindslight
Content: Yeah, I only covered the positive scenario. The alternative is that cryptography isn't enough to preserve the privacy of needles in the haystack, and that all communications will be tracked or blocked. In that case, technology only helps an ever shrinking group of people control all of society, and we're boned.

Author: DarkShikari
Content: The headline seems to imply that the two are mutually exclusive.
